website_summaries.verdict: A versatile three-in-one stick that offers a beautiful, hydrating lip color.
pros: Multi-purpose stick can be used as a lip color, blush, highlight, and eyeshadow
Hydrating, creamy formula leaves lips super soft
Perfect stick to carry with you for on-the-go touch-ups
cons: Color is not extremely pigmented on the lips but is easily buildable

website_summaries.verdict: Multi-use stick that can be used on the cheeks, eyes, lips, and even the body. Available in seven shimmering shades.
pros: This multi-purpose cream-to-powder stick is ideal for patting on the cheeks for a warm, healthy glow
Seven shades to flatter every skin tone
Gives a lovely sheen that is long-lasting
Contains acai oil and vitamin E to replenish the skin
cons: Some find the application process tricky and the stick difficult to blend

customer_reviews.title: orangey-pink with a noticeable gold shimmer
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a faint, almost orangey-pink with a noticeable gold shimmer. I wouldn’t use this on my lips - it looks kind of 60’s frosted. (Could maybe use sparingly to highlight eyes.) Nice texture, nice applicator. And apparently you can ‘build up’ the color with multiple applications, but that feels too heavy for me. I’ll probably use this once in a while, but won’t re-order this color.
customer_reviews.author: Colored Ink

customer_reviews.title: Natural glow in a stick!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only blush I have used for years. It looks so natural. Women comment on my complexion and want to know what I use. I owe the compliments to Nars The Multiple, Orgasm.
customer_reviews.author: VTR

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful feeling blush! I have used it for years. I love that it is in stick form because it easy to control the amount of color you want. This blush just makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: MB 713

customer_reviews.title: Love this blush-on-a-stick
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for a blush for someone with drier skin. For longer wear I layer the powder blush in the same shade right over it - topped with face powder to blend it all. I have re-ordered mutliple times!
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Product was clearly used, had smudge marks and scratches on bottle and color
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a damaged box with worns edges and tears and fingerprints all over it. The tube itself was super dirty with white smudges and obvious fingerprints all over it. Then I opened the top of the product and there was clear use of the makeup. There were swipes and scratches on top. Very very gross. Clearly dirty and unclean. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Em B

customer_reviews.title: At long last...
customer_reviews.text: This it! The blush I have been wanting all of my adult life. Finally, a color that looks so natural and lovely on my fair, cool toned skin. Now that I'm older (early 60s), I prefer cream blush but many are too oily looking and fade quickly. This blush looks perfect and lasts all day. I cannot say enough about the product. I will be ordering more to stock up in case they stop making it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Russell

customer_reviews.title: Magic Illumination
customer_reviews.text: Edge your lips in this and look like you have a Lana Del Rey pout. I'm not kidding. Good for highlighting the browbone too. Doesn't stay on very long if you are oily, as it is creamy, but nonetheless your selfie will be GORGEOUS! I bought it after grilling a professional make up artist about what was NON NEGOTIABLE in her kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bette D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like nor dislike this product. Just another cream blush. Honest seller, quick ship, so thanks for that. More hype than substance.
customer_reviews.author: Beach dweller

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am not using this product, it's too greasy, too heavy. I love the one that comes in a compact powder !!!! I will give five stars rating when I get the powder !!!
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR

customer_reviews.title: The best bronzer ever
customer_reviews.text: The best bronzer ever. Nars has discontinued it after years of being beloved by makeup artists and the public. They have many other colors but none comes close to St. Barts. Everyone should demand they bring it back.
customer_reviews.author: Em73

customer_reviews.title: Way overly priced- Price gone out of my range.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but getting to be not affordable. Price keeps going up and up. Last time I purchased it I paid $26 for it in 2015!!. Out of my price range now- not worth it at this price. I am sure there are equally good products out there for far less.
customer_reviews.author: TaraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The BEST blush ever!
customer_reviews.text: Natural looking on my face. The color goes with everything. Never gets dry or powdery.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Nars Multiple as a blush for years. It blends easily and looks very natural. I find it more flattering than powder blush for my slightly dry skin. The color Malibu works with both pink and orange toned lipstick so I use it every day no matter my color pallet. It may seem expensive but one stick of this blush lasts me more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: DJkat

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color, texture, really can give a natural but sophisticated look
customer_reviews.text: My only beef with the product is that it doesn't stay on as long as I'd like it too. But it has a really nice almost powdery texture. And the colors it comes in are terrific, at least on my fair freckled skin. I also dig out the bottom unused bit when I can't get any more out of the tube and I put it in a little tiny jar and carry it around in my purse for touch ups. Really like it. Really like NARS in general.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Good color that lasts
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this blush for a few years. I love how easy it is to apply and how well the color lasts throughout my day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: A Hint of Glow
customer_reviews.text: I gambled on this as it is something I don't think I would have purchased in a million years, but I saw it featured in More magazine, and decided to try it. In this color, it really is something different from blush. Just a hint of more glow for evenings out. Smells nice, and is very smooth and easy to control. Barely there look.
customer_reviews.author: Fox Island 34

customer_reviews.title: Nars multiple
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware that the product contained an iridescent look. The iridescence is difficult to constrain in one area (cheeks) and I found it spread to my lower face leaving an unwanted sparkle. I alsonfoundmit can not be used alone on the lips as it is extraordinarily dry.
customer_reviews.author: LWR

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around makeup!
customer_reviews.text: This color is so great! It was recommended by a friend and it really seems like it would work on a wide range of skin tones. I am really low maintenance with makeup, so I really only need this for eyes/lips/cheeks, powder and mascara and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Anne85

customer_reviews.title: Great color. Goes on so smooth and light
customer_reviews.text: Just enough color to make you look great but not totally made up. Love the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad dispatch of what you buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought and ordered a multi purpose bar, that said in The photo and the features and I got a lip gloss 👎
customer_reviews.author: Lidy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any color. Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Minimal color for $50. Not worth it. Cannot see it on my fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: handy: lips, cheeks, eyes
customer_reviews.text: Nice color that can be used on eyes, cheeks and lips.
customer_reviews.author: Firehorse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, ease of application, and how it looks. Lasts a long time and doesn’t dry my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Sheer and natural
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product in the past and was guessing on the color. It is a little lighter than I remember, but love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love NARS, The Multiple (not matte)
customer_reviews.text: I have Rivera which I love and it has a pink tone. I was afraid it was discontinued so I ordered this color, which is more peachy. It will be a nice color for summer skin tones. I prefer this product over a powder blush and will order again. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, but it is too light and doesn't last for long time, you have to reapply it many times, it has a little bit of glitter, it works well as a highlight
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Best Blush Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I use this blush on a daily basis. Its fresh peachy-pink color smoothes onto my fair skin easily, and doesn't "grab." Can be toned up or down, but if you have darker skin, order the same color in the powder. Both are great & the name is a kick!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush by NARS, I have two shades but this one is my fave! They blend so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said this is the BEST blush ever. I am in my late 40s and was afraid to try a pinkish color blush but this cream formula allows me to build the color. I can keep it as light as I want and it is still great! I have only used it as a blush and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: My Holy Grail blush I absolutely love this and it's so natural and gives you a beautiful dewy finish
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: product advertised as a regular size and mini size but all I received is the mini size. Please send or refund please.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pink cheeks!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this color. It's something special. We buy it because my daughter has very sensitive skin and the NARS does not irritate it. It is gentle and has a little glimmer. Seriously, a beautiful color of blush!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Matt pink
customer_reviews.text: Like item but thought it had an iridescence quality but actually it's a matt pink. It does have more pigment but prefer iridescence
customer_reviews.author: carolynneb

customer_reviews.title: Creamy & easy to use & easyto blend
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy use for a natural blush. I thought it was a little pricey
customer_reviews.author: Martin Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Flattering!
customer_reviews.text: Great, classic color. Blush glides on easily and looks natural. Creams are especially good for my age-challenged skin! Would have given it 5 stars, but since I apply straight from the tube, it would work better for me if the opening was a bit wider. Otherwise, I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: I'll Have What She's Having
customer_reviews.text: It's Nars. It's Orgasm. What could be better? This shimmery, peachy-pink adds a great glow to my fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but lasts a very long time...you need only a touch for a hint of natural color...make sure you smooth it out evenly on your cheek bones...uses fingers to smooth
customer_reviews.author: Chud

customer_reviews.title: The item I received was a. 14 oz sample ...
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was a .14 oz sample size, not the full size stick that was advertised. Do not order.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is so much better than powder blush.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy and flattering face finisher. Fro blush, eyeshadow and lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hintz

customer_reviews.title: It’s Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love Nars, use it under my makeup. Need to order some more.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Blondes!
customer_reviews.text: Good as a highlighter and for blondes. You can put it anywhere on your face. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sharon huggins

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and don't think I'll ever go back ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried it because a friend had some. I love this product and don't think I'll ever go back to powder blush again!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Willis

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: I got maui. It seems to be the best one for me. I have a slightly yellowish skin tone. I will give a bit of pop of color, not too bright, not too orange or brown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I have a slightly yellow complexion so pinks look bad and corals look orange. This is just right. Only con: doesn't seem to last that long...have to re-apply during the day.
customer_reviews.author: books-aholic60

customer_reviews.title: Nars "The Multiple"
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product- I have it in South Beach and Portofino. It's so much better than powder blush- blends into your skin and looks glowing and smooth-beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R. Libner

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The only one I have used in the past 5 years. Natural looking, great texture.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best blusher I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: It is unlikely that I will ever use another blush. This product goes on and looks beautiful. Not greasy, doesn't smear. Very light sparkle too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Too light
customer_reviews.text: That's the problem with ordering online....you can't actually see the colour. It is a nice product, but its far too light for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: M. Trainor

customer_reviews.title: Good value !
customer_reviews.text: Is a beautiful creamy highlighter that blends well & doesn't look drastic . It blended well . I used it on eyes & cheek bones both . Not cheap but will last a good while!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca bladen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! I would buy all of them if they weren't so costly!
customer_reviews.author: sarah harvey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Apply
customer_reviews.text: The blush goes on easily, and the tube packaging makes it easy to carry with you. I keep it in my golf bag for quick touch-ups on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blush color
customer_reviews.text: NARS Orgasm has long been my favorite powder blush and I thought the moist stick would be a good companion, mostly for its multi-use function. It glides on cheeks easily and cleanly with no smearing and the color - that lovely, goldy-pink - is true. It also makes a quick and easy eye shadow and a lip gloss with just a few quick swipes. The beautiful shade looks unmade-up, clean, and natural, yet somehow better than bare. Admittedly it's a bit pricey but I console myself with its quality, color, and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Cella

customer_reviews.title: My Complexion Glows
customer_reviews.text: I love the multi-purpose stick, the creamy formula, pink champagne with shimmer color which is easy to apply and my complexion glows.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Bo

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: This was ok as a blush but not great for lips as was suggested. Just not for me. Perhaps for others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One half the size I thought I was ordering. Not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of this cheek color. I only wish it didn't have the glitter element.
customer_reviews.author: RTR

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and blends with all makeup
customer_reviews.text: Have used NARS blush for years and love this color as it goes with nearly all outfits and all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: JS1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and application, just wished it lasted longer on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great authentic  blush. Reorder a fake!
customer_reviews.text: First order was authentic! Second order fro MishelbSnitkovsjy was an ugly small FAKE!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: emmert

customer_reviews.title: NARS Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased the NARS Multiple Copacabana. It lasts forever and it a great highlighter!
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: This color is incredible....
customer_reviews.text: The good thing about this stick is that you can use it on your eyes, on your checks, and on your lips.... You can do almost anything you want with it just use your imagination...
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Torres

customer_reviews.title: NARS Multiple St. Barts
customer_reviews.text: Love the mulitple from NARS. It is so versatile and can be worn to work or vamped up with a litle eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: aries

customer_reviews.title: I love my multiple
customer_reviews.text: I love my multiple!! I use it for my cheeks and my eyes. Highlights and contours perfectly!! Palm Beach is the best shade ( my skin tone is medium to dark). I am so upset that Nars has discontinued that shade :( Hopefully they will bring it back!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Moore

customer_reviews.title: GOTTA HAVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is no secret, but Nars Orgasm blushers are the best!! And who would think by looking at the shade? It looks way too bright and peachy/pinky/orangey! But, nope, it actually ends up looking quite natural. I use it on my cheeks, then dab a bit on my lips. And on little makeup days I use it as eyeshadow as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This cream stick is perfect. The color is natural and goes on smoothly. I use it for my cheeks, my eyelids and my lips. Very natural and lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is amazingly smooth and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is amazingly smooth and easy to apply. It is more natural looking than powder and lasts all day. One tube lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually mostly a drugstore makeup gal. I had read many blogs and reviews that said NARS Multiple Orgasm was a brilliant makeup staple. I'm a fair-skinned brunette in my mid-30s and was a little skeptical that this color would be too orangey and peachy for me. But I've been very pleased using it for my cheeks and lips. It has a bit of shimmer that gives you a nice glow. It's not super-creamy or oily, but more powdery and smooth. It's probably best for cheeks but I also like it on my lips for quick color. I can see how this would be great for nearly any skin complexion. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: alta27

customer_reviews.title: Nars The Multiple; Orgasm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to give cheeks a healthy glow. I also love the size of the "head", as well as it's compactness, making this great for travelling!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: A little pinky/rosy color. Looks great on lips and eyelids Can't wait until the Multiple comes out in Super Orgasm.....
customer_reviews.author: meister

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this color. It is kind of halfway blush/halfway bronzer on my cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but it cakes a bit over my moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: or more Find it great, gives my complexión a lovely natural colour and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 3 years,or more Find it great ,gives my complexión a lovely natural colour and shine and lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: BertyB

customer_reviews.title: My Mom LOVES This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Mother's Day. She loves it. She says that it goes on very smooth and feels very soft and light on her skin. She used it until there was absolutely NOTHING left.
customer_reviews.author: Nailah W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nars stick blush color was good but did not come with in proper packaging .....no box.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This just didn't look very natural on me no matter how I applied it. I will try other colors, but Copacabana was a dud for me.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: takes some adjusting after using a powder
customer_reviews.text: There is a definate learning curve to using. I am a Bare Minerals user, but this caught my eye. The first couple applications were interesting, but the more I use it the better it is.
customer_reviews.author: North Gate Outlander

customer_reviews.title: Love the Multiple by Nars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Multiple by Nars in Portofino. This is a great item to throw in your bag when you are on the go. I used it as both a blush and a lip colour. The lip colour was a bit on the dry side but it lasted really well. You can put some gloss over the top to give it some shine. I am fair with blond hair and this is a great colour. It brightens without making me look clown-like. A great little item when I need to add a bit of colour. A bit on the expensive side - but it is actually worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful color. I have very fair skin and can look too red or pink with blushes. This leaves a very subtle shimmer and very light pink. It really gives that flush look that seems natural. I am also using it on my lips for a very natural look. This product blends really easy and seems like one tube will last a very long time. I highly recommend it and already love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Color
customer_reviews.text: Nice peachy/rose color. Goes on without streaking and stays all day. My new favorite. I wear it on top of my foundation but before I apply powder so the color seems to come from within.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Vance

customer_reviews.title: Copacabana good highlighter
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this multiple in Copacabana. It's a nice highlighter. A little more on the shimmery side than i had thought. I was hesitant to buy Luxor, because I was afraid of looking too pink. (I have a lot of red undertones) So far I have Orgasm,Copacabana,Palm beach. I have Malibu on the way! All the multiples are good just for the fact you can get lots of different looks. Btw I have super sensitive skin and these don't break me out at all!! I use Bare minerals before application. Looks awesome!! Use Taj Mahal blush and add a little Copacabana-they all look and blend well w others. Great product! -Sarah Willis
customer_reviews.author: Paul Willis

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I first found this product at J.C. Penneys, then it was no longer available at penneys. I found it at Amazon and I ordered the make-up. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Parker

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product. It works like a blush too. Gostei do produto. Nesta cor, também pode ser usada como blush. Estava com receio, pois nao gostei do batom da Nars, aquele em forma de lápis. Felizmente, o iluminador nao decepcionou. Também gostei do vendedor. Recomendo a ambos.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved it, she uses it only for formal meetings, good quality, well made. Highly recommended, particularly the orgasm color.
customer_reviews.author: Luis S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color with a healthy glow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a brunette with hazel eyes and pale skin with pink undertones and this is the perfect color. It gives a beautiful healthy glow, especially for those of us over 50. For first time buyers there are a number of instructional videos on the Internet that will help you achieve the look for you. Definately worth the price and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Maybe too much glimmer???
customer_reviews.text: As a "woman of a certain age", I was excited to try this highly rated blush. The color is really beautiful, and I wish I could keep it. For me, however, the amount of glimmer in this blush makes me look almost cartoonish - too much of a good thing. It suits younger skin, I'm sure; might try it for evening, but suspect it will look too garish in harsher lighting. Too bad...
customer_reviews.author: meepkat

customer_reviews.title: Best cheek color ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - it lasts forever and is so flattering to my skin, I never want to be without it. I use it as a cheek color only, and it's far superior to any powder blush I've ever tried. Totally worth the price. Hope NARS never stops making this!
customer_reviews.author: sparkalicious

customer_reviews.title: Half price for a reason...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the Nars Luxor. I already had another color of the multiple and loved it! I jumped on the opportunity to get the Luxor color for under $20, but when I started applying it the application went on in clumps. Not the smooth even application I was accustomed to with the other color I own. Obviously there was a reason for the price cut. There must have been a large bad batch of this particular color. Think twice about ordering this Luxor color. It is half price for a reason....
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Jairett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE - but not for lips
customer_reviews.text: I love NARS and have used both "the multiple" and the compact powder version on this blush. I love the ease with which "the multiple" applies, but I found it too light (and somewhat cakey) when used on the lips. I used it strictly as a blush, and for that, it works great. I prefer the color density that you get when using the compact (I find it's easier to control the amount of coverage that you're going for), but "the multiple" gets bonus points for not cracking apart as can happen with any compact.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not a "multiple"
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the "multiple" in description of this product. It is pricey for one, repeat ONE item. I like the product, but if it were not for the quarantine I would find the same thing at Saphora for far less money. Fool me once!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone I have introduced this blush to has loved it and is now using it themselves
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this blush stick for years. It lasts a LONG time. Goes on smoothly, doesn't dry out your skin, not greasy at all. Everyone I have introduced this blush to has loved it and is now using it themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Raines

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The color is flattering on my cheeks and I like that it's a cream so it doesn't settle in creases like a powder. My only complaint would be is that the shade is too light for lip color in my opinion- it's called the multiple and I can only use on my cheeks- minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Hollydoodle

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from London International Perfumes and Cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the product. I bought South Beach and find it much easier to work with than Nars liquid illuminators. HOWEVER, 1 star for the seller (London International Perfumes and Cosmetics). Item was listed as the standard full size (0.5 oz), but I received a miniature size (0.14 oz) instead.
customer_reviews.author: rien

customer_reviews.title: natural-look and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is the most natural-looking blush I have owned. It is what most lead you to when you enter Sephora and ask for a recommended blush. This is my favorite blush, along with NARS super-orgasm. To me, the stick application looks more natural than powder blush.
customer_reviews.author: JustaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to the price and hype
customer_reviews.text: I expected more for the price and the reputation of the product. It looks good for a while, then fades away. Perhaps that’s just my skin, but I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: M Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, it really gives a nice glow - I carry it in my bag every day. It's the perfect versatile fixer-upper if you're feeling pale or you forgot your lipstick. Or even your eyelids! I'm blonde haired and blue eyed but I really think this would work for just about any complexion. Great product! I sent one to my mom, too. She loves it also.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ciocca

customer_reviews.title: Love Nars!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blush ever, especially if you are older, a creme stick is what you want and not only is the color great, it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: K. Roe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Lasts all day giving you a healthy glow. I also use on my eyelids it does not crease!
customer_reviews.author: Sally 07

customer_reviews.title: For a very healthy glow....
customer_reviews.text: I love the color - it adds just the right amount of healthy color to my checks. I put it on with my finger as I learned to do from a make-up artist - thus controlling the color intensity and placement. As I have oily skin, I sometimes put a touch of powered blusher over - but don't think this is necessary for those with normal skin.
customer_reviews.author: beebee

customer_reviews.title: Only get if you plan to use for everything!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t apply as well as regular blush, but it is nice if you do like to use it for all three uses. The color didn’t stay on my lips very long though. Great for an eyeshadow. Wishing I would have just bought the blush again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

product_meta.title: NARS The Multiple, Orgasm
product_meta.description: Color:OrgasmThe original multi-purpose stick for eyes, cheeks, lips and body. Its unique creamy formula and sheer color blends effortlessly to create shimmering accents, contours or dynamic highlights on all skin tones.
feature_bullets: A luxurious liquid makeup that gives your skin a flawless finish and broad-spectrum protection
It evens out skin tone and smoothes wrinkles and imperfections with its patented formula that contains anti-aging technologies and vitamins and minerals
It also hides away imperfections and skin discoloration
